name: Blood "Enhancements" and New Weapons 1.3 (Not very original)                                                                                                                                                                             Don't you have anythin
description: A bunch of things that I downloaded from the Doom FTP : Archives and put together in a WAD file that probably : violates a few copyrights. Even worse, I had to go : and "touch up" some of the graphics, so they may or : may not look "better." At the very least, I can say : that it looks better than a majority of the "ultra gore" : and "super weapons" stuff available, even if only : because some other people have no standards.
